thread.section_title: Express to Russia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Express to Russia | expresstorussia.com
thread.title: Aoife
thread.title_full: Express to Russia reviewed by Aoife

author: Aoife
title: Aoife
text:
I would highly recommend this company.
A group of six of us have just returned from a fantastic trip organised by Express to Russia. Our first point of contact was Yulia who organised an itinerary based on our needs. She was in regular contact with us and changed the itinerary to suit our needs.
The guides were knowledgeable, friendly and professional. Again, they went over and beyond to help us.
I would again recommend Russia as a place to visit and this company to organise your trip.
